articles.description: Chris Clemons knocked down five 3-pointers and scored 25 points as Campbell took over sole possession of third place in the Big South Conference by cruising past Longwood, 88-54 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Campbell alone in 3rd in Big South, beats Longwood 88-54

articles.description: Desmond Ringer had 17 points and seven rebounds, Ross Cummings added 16 points with four 3-pointers and Mercer beat Chattanooga 84-75 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Mercer tops Chattanooga 84-75

articles.description: Jaren Lewis had 20 points and 17 rebounds on Saturday and Abilene Christian led by double digits for most of the second half in an 80-69 win over Incarnate Word.
articles.headline: Lewis leads Abilene Christian over Incarnate Word 80-69

articles.description: Jordon Varnado scored 23 points with 13 rebounds and Troy defeated Little Rock 82-64 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Varnado leads Troy with double-double in 82-64 win

articles.description: Johnathan Stove had a career-best 28 points and Bryce Washington added 18 with 13 rebounds as Louisiana recovered from its only Sun Belt Conference loss by getting past Georgia Southern 102-91 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Louisiana recovers from only league loss, beats Ga. Southern

articles.description: Dachon Burke scored 29 points, Matty McConnell added 23 -- both career highs -- and the pair combined for seven 3-pointers as Robert Morris beat LIU Brooklyn 96-82 on Saturday to snap a four-game slide.
articles.headline: Robert Morris tops LIU Brooklyn 96-82
